name: Rawr Nails: Queen of Hearts - Black Red Silver White Glitter Nail Polish Custom
description:
You are purchasing a 15ml bottle of: Queen of Hearts - Their heads will roll when they spot you rocking our "Queen of Hearts". How regal you'll look with our stunning black, silver, red, and white shape glitters glazed over white or black polish - or worn alone, if you dare.

At Rawr Nail Cosmetics, we know the importance of making sure your nails look *great*. That's why we handcraft our polishes with unique blends of pigment & glitters to channel your inner diva. Our designs are flirty, fierce, & fabulous! Take a walk on the wild side with us and find your color today!

Because our motto is "healthy nails = healthy life", we make sure our polishes are crafted with only the safest suspension bases around. Unlike many mass-produced nail polishes, ours are free of harsh chemicals like Toluene, Formaldehyde and dibutyl phthalate.

Disclaimer: Our products are 100% handcrafted from our extensive collection of fine glitters & pigments. We do not mass-produce; and so, our polishes may not be entirely consistent. We like to be as unique as possible. :) 

Shipping: Due to shipping laws, we are only able to ship within the contiguous U.S. (lower 48 only) and via Ground.

 

Have an upcoming wedding, prom, or special event? We can make your own custom nail polish color! Just drop us a message with your ideas and we'll work with you from there.

We're on Instagram!

  • Blog: Rawr Nail Cosmetics
  • Visit our Facebook page!
  • Follow us on Twitter!

name: Rawr Nails: Ever After - Hearts Pink Red Glitter Nail Polish Custom
description:
You are purchasing a 15ml bottle of: Ever After - Don't you wish love could last forever? Now, it can. With our super romantic polish "Ever After". We packed as many hearts as we could into this one and sprinkled it with a little magic. Perfect for a fun date or if you need a little "Oomph!"

name: Rawr Nails: Pink Royalty - Pink Gold - Glitter Nail Polish Custom
description:
You are purchasing a 15ml bottle of: Pink Royalty - Gold glitter is fabulous, but fab isn't enough for us, we want you to be FIERCE. So we threw in pink and other goodness to create this polish. You can layer "Pink Royalty" over just about any color to create an amazing shimmering effect like only a queen should have.

We provided two swatches, one picture shows our glitter polish on it's own, and the second shows the glitter polish layered over a base color.
